articles.title: Twitter threatens legal action over Threads app - BBC
articles.description: Its owner Elon Musk says "competition is fine, cheating is not" a day after the rival app launches.
articles.content:
Twitter is considering legal action against Meta over its fast-growing rival app Threads.
Threads, which was launched to millions on Wednesday, is similar to Twitter and has been pitched by Meta bos… [+2769 chars]

articles.author: News Staff
articles.title: Planetary Scientists Find Large Granite Formation on Moon’s Far Side - Sci.News
articles.description: The 50-km-diameter granitic system discovered below the far side feature known as Compton-Belkovich Volcanic Complex likely was formed from the cooling of molten lava that fed a volcano or volcanoes that erupted approximately 3.5 billion years ago.
articles.content: The 50-km-diameter granitic system discovered below the far side feature known as Compton-Belkovich Volcanic Complex likely was formed from the cooling of molten lava that fed a volcano or volcanoes … [+3104 chars]

articles.author: Gwendolyn Rak
articles.title: Postacute Effects of COVID on par With Those of Sepsis, Flu - Medscape
articles.description: Compared with influenza and sepsis, severe COVID-19 infections resulted in similar risk for neurological and cardiovascular conditions, suggesting a common need for long-term support.
articles.content:
Posthospitalization risks associated with COVID-19 are similar to those associated with other infectious diseases, new research finds.
A large observational study examined population-wide data for 1… [+6191 chars]
